reviewText: My 2yr old LOVES THIS!!  Taught him how to jump and dance around!  Keeps his interest, unlike the other ones (Elmosize, dance along and gegt up and groove).  He cannot get enough of Grover and Cookie Monster on this, lots of puppet action!!  Which is WHY we watch these, LOL.  Wish there was another just as good!
Title: N/A

reviewText: This lively DVD is just what we needed to jump-start our toddler.  She literally JUMPS all over the place to keep up with Elmo, Ernie, Big Bird, Cookie Monster, Zoe and all the Sesame gang as they sing and dance to silly songs.Excercise is so important for kids of any age, and this introduction to fitness is just what we were looking for.  It's downright FUN!  It's the first and only DVD that got our child OFF THE COUCH and kept her entertained while teaching something at the same time.It also goes over healthy eating habits, i.e., fruits, yogurt, cheese and vegetables, and our daughter loves to receit each food item as they appear on the screen.  There are fun songs about eating right too, and this adds to the fun of learning.Unlike some of the other Elmo's World and Sesame Street DVD's which our children will outgrow, this one is a definite keeper as they get older!
Title: N/A

reviewText: Ever since we got "Happy Healthy Monsters" for our son, he has become an advocate of jumping. He's "jumping" everywhere he goes and invites everyone around him  ("Come on Daddy, jump!") to join in. I am happy to see this, because a few months ago he was a bit on the "lazy" side (perhaps his workaholic parents that stared for long periods at the computer screen were not the best example). So, though we now have a living spring bouncing around the house, that seems to be a good 'problem' to have in this world of sedentary and overweight kids.
summary: A great way to make exercize fun for your kids
Title: N/A

reviewText: My two kids, age 4 and 3, watch this video over and over. It's really teaching them to get active and eat healthy. my little one is actually asking for healthy foods now! There's a lot of humor in there for the grownups watching as well (which makes repeat viewing enjoyable for me, too). My kids love to jump along with grover, and they really get a kick out of the slapstick. I'm so glad we got this video!

reviewText: This is a great DVD to entertain child.  My 23 age child loves it.  This DVD keeps child occupied and grabs their attention.  You can teach toddler and twos, how to jump.  Also your child will learn words from this DVD.
Title: N/A

reviewText: Happy Healthy Monsters is the DVD release of A Sesame Street show that was originally only on VHS.  Grover and his pals teach children about the importance of healthy eating habits, getting plenty of rest, and exercising the body. The "Happy Healthy Monsters" television network is home to "Fuzzy, Blue and Healthy, Too", Grover's own fitness show. Watching the program alongside Elmo and Zoe, kids will learn that being healthy can also be fun. Special guests include Andy Richter, Wyclef Jean, India Arie, and Fred Willard.It's a direct transfer from video.  It's fun but at just a 45 minute run time for $12, a bit pricey.
summary: TEACHING KIDS TO BE HEALTHY & HAPPY
